name: Dukov
descriptions: Dukov is a drunken womanizer and retired mercenary in the Capital Wasteland in 2277.

Dukov's life mainly consists of partying and having sex with women, a reflection of his carefree yet sleazy nature. Although he is profane, boisterous, and has an obnoxiously loud and distinctive laugh, Dukov is nevertheless charismatic. He is concerned only with his material possessions, his lavish home (or "pad" as he calls it), and women.

He is one of the three surviving mercenaries hired by Allistair Tenpenny for an expedition into Fort Constantine. He is now retired, and lives in his estate (Dukov's Place) along the east bank of the Potomac River in the D.C ruins.
He spends his time drinking lots of alcohol and taking Jet with Cherry and Fantasia. Though one will never see it, he talks often about his "parties" with the two girls.

topics.topic_text: Who are those girls? And where are their clothes?
topics.response_text: Ha ha! They're my party girls.{Over loud laugh, like a bad used car salesman.}

topics.topic_text: Hey, can I have some of that hooch?
topics.response_text: Help yourself, clown shoes. Grab one from the liquor cabinet. I never trust anyone without a drink in their hand.

topics.topic_text: I'd better go before I get a headache.
topics.response_text: You need to drink more. Ha, ha!

topics.topic_text: So... What exactly is this place?
topics.response_text: It's my hidey hole. Nobody can fuck with me here.

topics.topic_text: What are you doing way out here by yourself?
topics.response_text: Eating, drinking, farting and screwing! Ha, ha!

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: You've got your god damn key. Isn't that enough?

topics.topic: MS14CrowleyWhat can you tell me about Mister Crowley?
topics.topic_text: Someone said you might know a Mister Crowley. Care to comment?
topics.response_text: He's fucking dead, that's what I can tell you.{Loud and boisterous}

topics.topic_text: What's the key for?
topics.response_text: You need all the keys to get through that fucking fort.

topics.topic_text: Crowley is alive, and he paid me to kill you because you hate Ghouls.
topics.response_text: What? Fuck me sideways! No, better yet, fuck him. I swear, I'll jam a grenade so far up his ass...

topics.topic_text: Can your table handle 200 caps?
topics.response_text: Now that's what I'm talking about!

topics.topic_text: Where is this Fort Constantine?
topics.response_text: It's northwest of here, numb nuts. A long fucking walk, too.

topics.topic_text: I don't think I need to hear any more.
topics.response_text: Good. I'm getting tired of flapping jaw with you, clown shoes.

topics.topic_text: I've heard enough for now.
topics.response_text: Motherfucking right you have! He should have known better than to send some clown shoes of an assassin to take me out.

topics.topic_text: You can give me the key, or I can take it. Your choice.
topics.response_text: You got some big brass ones, you know that. And fuck me if I don't think you could do it.

topics.topic: MS14DukovIntimidateAre you sure I can't just have that key, handsome? You know, as a present?
topics.topic_text: How about I let you live, and you give me something so I can lie to Crowley?
topics.response_text: For you, sweet cheeks? Sure thing!

topics.topic_text: I have some caps. How about I buy "proof" that I killed you.
topics.response_text: What the fuck is this? You call that money?

topics.topic_text: How did all of you meet?
topics.response_text: Tenpenny hired us as mercs. He wanted some fancy fucking gun.

topics.topic_text: Actually, Crowley is alive. He wants some sort of security key you have.
topics.response_text: So the meatbag is alive, huh? Fine with me. Just show me the money. Put your fucking caps on the table and you can have it.

topics.topic_text: Where did he die?
topics.response_text: A little shithole called Fort Constantine. It fucked us up but good.

topics.topic_text: So it was just you and Mister Crowley?
topics.response_text: Ha, ha! No, clown shoes. Tenpenny hired a whole fucking team.

topics.topic: MS14HereToKillYouI'm here to kill you, and there's nothing you can do about it.
topics.topic_text: I'm going to put a bullet right between your eyes.
topics.response_text: Oh, yeah? Give it your best shot, clown shoes!

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: That dog ain't gonna hunt. You're going to have to do better than that.

conversation.response_text: Huh? What? Oh yeah, baby! That's what I like.
Maybe next week, babe. We've got enough liquor to last for a while. That's the only thing that's important! Hah ha!{Loud and obnoxious, thinks everything he says is hilarious.}
Nonsense. You haven't had enough to drink. Hah ha!. Have another shot. That will settle your stomach.{Over emphasize "enough"Loud and obnoxious, thinks everything he says is hilarious.}
That's just the river. Have some booze.{Loud and obnoxious.}
Think I'll get in some target practice.
Don't let the door hit you on the ass, clown shoes. Hah ha!
Hey, clown shoes. I hope that key was worth it.
Tara's dead. Crowley fucked up and got her killed. Fucking ghoul. When I'm done, he'll sniff butts with the ferals for the rest of his life.
You're drawing on me, clown shoes? I don't think so!

combat.response_text: I'm gonna rip you up, clown shoes!
Son of a bitch! I'm outta here!
Hey! You! Get the hell out of here!
Ah! What did you have to go and do that for? Such a fucking waste.
Hey! Only my bitches are allowed in my pants!
